data.title: 11.3% of the population is hungry
data.description: That’s rough 805 million people who go undernourished on a daily basis, consuming less than the recommended 2,100 calories a day.

data.title: 1/3 of the world’s food was lost or wasted
data.description: For millions of people in low-income countries or the homeless, this lost  food can be a meal.

data.title: $0.5 dollar can provide one meal, 1.5$ three
